title: Kirsty Williams – 2013 Speech to Liberal Democrat Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the leader of the Welsh Liberal Democrats, Kirsty Williams, to the Liberal Democrat Conference in Glasgow on 16th August 2013.
